description: facing blue screen issue in PC
review_summary: The issue was that the RAM was in poor condition
resolution_steps: The issue was that the RAM was in poor condition. We cleaned and restarted the system, which resolved the problem. Monitor the system for stability over the next 24 hours and replace the RAM if similar issues occur again.
